job.title: Software Engineer - All Teams (All Levels)
job.description: At Lyft our mission is to improve peoples lives with the worlds best transportation To do this we start with our own community by creating an open inclusive and diverse organizationltbrgtltbrgtLyft is looking for experienced software engineers from a scope of disciplines We are growing our team with people who want to build improve and incorporate technologies that make the lives of our community more enriched As an engineer at Lyft youll collaborate with teams like product data science analytics and operations on code that empower us to iterate quickly while focusing on delighting our passengers and driversltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtHelp establish roadmap and architecture based on technology and our needsltligtltligtWrite wellcrafted welltested readable maintainable codeltligtltligtParticipate in code reviews to ensure code quality and distribute knowledgeltligtltligtShare your knowledge by giving brown bags tech talks and promoting appropriate tech and engineering best practicesltligtltligtCan help lead large projects from idea to positive executionltligtltligtUnblock support and communicate with internal partners to achieve resultsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtExperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of software engineering industry experienceltligtltligtExperience with objectoriented programmingltligtltligtExperience in distributed systemsltligtltligtExperience working with databases relational or NoSQLltligtltligtWrite clear scalable and clear design documentationltligtltligtDesign build and improve a set of team owned componentsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtGreat medical dental and vision insurance optionsltligtltligtMental health benefitsltligtltligtIn addition to 12 observed holidays salaried team members have unlimited paid time off hourly team members have 15 days paid time offltligtltligt401k plan to help save for your futureltligtltligt18 weeks of paid parental leave Biological adoptive and foster parents are all eligibleltligtltligtPretax commuter benefitsltligtltligtLyft Pink  Lyft team members get an exclusive opportunity to test new benefits of our Ridership ProgramltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtLyft is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability status protected veteran status or any other basis prohibited by law We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable federal state and local lawltemgt
